body_html: The problem is that the semantics of multinomial is that it takes an unnormalized vector, and as such it should normalize it to a probability distribution and sample from that. Since our normalization algorithm is simply / sum(values), it doesn't work with infinite elements (unlike e.g. softmax).

body: The problem is that the semantics of `multinomial` is that it takes an unnormalized vector, and as such it should normalize it to a probability distribution and sample from that. Since our normalization algorithm is simply `/ sum(values)`, it doesn't work with infinite elements (unlike e.g. `softmax`).
